query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ab_test_metrics (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  experimentId INT NOT NULL,
  variant ENUM('A', 'B') NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  avgCpuPercent INT NOT NULL,
  avgMemoryPercent INT NOT NULL,
  avgResponseTimeMs INT,
  errorRate INT,
  scaleUpCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  scaleDownCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  avgReplicaCount INT NOT NULL,
  estimatedCostUnits INT,
  oscillationCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  cooldownViolations INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FbHQcBqwdUAeZd.daf6bd01f5d9 --database bVoJhS4CeCN2GuJxoMncsM --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ab_test_metrics (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  experimentId INT NOT NULL,
  variant ENUM('A', 'B') NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  avgCpuPercent INT NOT NULL,
  avgMemoryPercent INT NOT NULL,
  avgResponseTimeMs INT,
  errorRate INT,
  scaleUpCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  scaleDownCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  avgReplicaCount INT NOT NULL,
  estimatedCostUnits INT,
  oscillationCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  cooldownViolations INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL
);
